name: The Hummingbird Backpackers B&B (Orca Room Bed 2)
description: Come join us in our high-end, backpackers style accommodation on beautiful Salt Spring Island. You'll stay in a comfortable single bunk bed in a co-ed dorm room, and have access to all the beauty the island offers. We are a 5 min drive to Ganges, on the bus route and walking distance to 2 lakes and a nature reserve. We have a modern living space with plenty of room to cook and mingle. To book Multiple beds, please book the individual listings by searching "Hummingbird Backpackers" on airbnb.
amenities: ["Conditioner", "Heating", "Keypad", "Self check-in", "Shampoo", "Smoke alarm", "Free parking on premises", "Outdoor shower", "Outdoor dining area", "Hot water", "Fire extinguisher", "Cooking basics", "Wifi", "Kitchen", "Fire pit", "First aid kit", "Shower gel"]
